com.esplibrary.bluetooth

Interface IScanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothScanner

    public interface IScanner
    Interface for interacting with a V1 BluetoothDevice Scanner.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isScanning()
      Indicates if a scanning is currently taking place.
      boolean scanForDevice(java.lang.String address, ConnectionType type)
      Asynchronously scans for a BluetoothDevice with the MAC address == address.
      boolean scanForType(ConnectionType type)
      Start a scan for the specified ConnectionType type.
      void setScanCallback(BTScanListener listener)
      Sets a listener that will received callbacks every time a BluetoothDevice is scanned.
      void setScanMode(int scanMode)
      Set scan mode for Bluetooth LE scan.
      void setTimeout(long timeout)
      Sets the BluetoothDevice scan timeout.
      void stopScan()
      Stops the BluetoothDevice scan taking place.

    • Method Detail

      • setScanCallback

        void setScanCallback(BTScanListener listener)
        Sets a listener that will received callbacks every time a BluetoothDevice is scanned.

      • setTimeout

        void setTimeout(long timeout)
        Sets the BluetoothDevice scan timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the scan timeout in milliseconds.

      • setScanMode

        void setScanMode(int scanMode)
        Set scan mode for Bluetooth LE scan.
        Parameters:
        scanMode - The scan mode can be one of ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER, ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_BALANCED or ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the scanMode is invalid.

      • scanForDevice

        boolean scanForDevice(java.lang.String address,
                      ConnectionType type)
        Asynchronously scans for a BluetoothDevice with the MAC address == address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to scan for.
        type - The type of the BluetoothDevice.
        Returns:
        True if the device scan has been started.

      • scanForType

        boolean scanForType(ConnectionType type)
        Start a scan for the specified ConnectionType type.
        Parameters:
        type - Connection type to scan. Note ConnectionType.Demo is not a valid scan type
        Returns:
        True if a scan was started.

      • isScanning

        boolean isScanning()
        Indicates if a scanning is currently taking place.

      • stopScan

        void stopScan()
        Stops the BluetoothDevice scan taking place.
